item.description:
Hey Everyone,

We are going to have our annual Commonwealth Christmas Party on Dec 14. Like we did last year we are also inviting the Aussies to help bring in some Christmas cheer. We will be meeting at 7:30 PM by the bar at Kings. After having dinner and/or drinks we'll play some pool and bowling. Come down to Kings and have a beer with your Australian cousins! Hope you can make it!

Andrew

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Expat Canadian December Meetup- Commonwealth Christmas Party
